Halal Options.

name: COVID-related Essential Cleaning Kits
description:
Due to the rapid rising community cases of COVID-19, quite a number of families are undergoing financial hardships. Currently, our beneficiaries under care of our centre, Community Services & Programmes, are in urgent need of 42 sets of cleaning kits (consisting of 2 disinfectant sprays, 1 box of disinfectant wipes, 3 child-friendly hand sanitizers). The families need to stay at home for quarantine that they are unable to go out for work. Meanwhile, the whole family members are affected and some of them will even have to spend their SSO money to purchase COVID-related essentials. 
 
The items can be delivered to our centre, Community Services & Programmes located at Block 529 Bedok North Street 3 #01-570, Singapore 460529. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg for discussion of delivery arrangement.

name: Halal Fresh Food Ration

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Transport Needs
description:
Client resides in a 2-room rental unit with her husband and 7 children. Her husband does food delivery and is the sole breadwinner of the family as client is currently pregnant. 
The family experiences difficulties in making ends meet, amidst having multiple health and chronic issues as well. Husband's medical condition is acting up and will be unable to work for a few days.
Thank you.

name: Daily Meals [URGENT]
description: The family have just tested positive for COVID (both parents). There are 3 adults and 2 children in the house and they need halal certified daily meals. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg or +65 94367401 for more details. We greatly appreciate your kind support!

name: Cleaning Products
description: Client is a 26 y/o single mother with two children. Due to childhood abandonment issues and a verbally abusive relationship with her adopted mother, client has developed a strong attachment to cats as they make her feel safe. This has resulted in client accumulating up to 40 cats. However, she is currently trying to sterilise all her cats and give most of them away as she is financially and physically unable to clean/care for all of them. It has been a challenge for client to afford cleaning products to clean the house and the cats' droppings have caused the house to have a strong odour. As such, she would greatly benefit from the donation of the following cleaning products: Dettol Antiseptic Germicide Liquid, Bleach, Jif Lemon Cream Surface Cleaner, Lifebuoy Botanitech™ Multi-purpose Disinfectant Spray, mop and broom and scrub

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: abbott panbio covid-19 antigen self-test / acon biotech flowflex sars-cov-2 antigen rapid test
description:
Mdm Shabrina is married with 4 young children, aged 6 years old, 3 years old, 2 years old and 10 months old. Husband is the main breadwinner supporting 6 of them. Client just started a new part-time job after 6 years of taking care of her children.

Client is requesting for this as her 10-month-old baby's infant care is asking her baby to take the test everyday using either this 2 kits. Client cant afford to purchase that

name: Milk Powder - 3HA Gold Colour
description: Client and partner recently started employment as low wage earners. They are supporting their 5 children and their current income requires support with their children's necessities.

contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Dugro 5 (Asli)
description: Client has 4 young children who needed milk powder. Client is unemployed while client's partner is a Grab driver. Client's household does not have sufficient income to purchase basic necessities for their children.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Frisolac Gold AR milk formular
description: The baby is in need of 12 tins of Frisolac Gold AR milk formular now. These are for infants who require milk  formula containing Carob Bean Gum and this type is recommended by specialist. We welcome whatever quantities that the donor wishes to donate and there is no obligation on the minimum items donated. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg for delivery details. Thank you for your kind and generous support!

name: Cat foods and necessities
description:
Family of six with 4 children are caring for 12 cats. They are facing financial difficulties this month due to a pay cut and would need help affording cat food and necessities while we assist them in rehoming their cats. Here are needed items: 
1. Wet food (Aastas Cat Soupy Stew Tuna)
2. Dry food (NicePets Premium Pro Meal)
3. Litter sand (Aatas Cat Kuick Klump)
4. Milk for kittens

name: Groceries Needs
description:
Family has 7 pax in total, with 5 children. 
Client is temporarily unfit for work while her husband was asked to resign a month back due to his poor health condition. 
The family faces chronic financial difficulties due to debts, and coupled with no income now, they are not able to make ends meet. 
Request for NTUC vouchers to cover the family's basic necessities and fresh groceries.
Thank you.

name: Adult Diapers
description: Hi there, a low income family is looking for adult diapers. Brand: Tena. Size: L. Type: tape and not pants. The recipient is requesting for budget value one. Thanks in advance.

name: Vacuum cleaner
description: Client is the sole breadwinner of the family. Her husband is medically unfit for work as he has multiple chronic illnesses. Client has 3 school-going children. Client has financial hardship. Client requires a vacuum cleaner to assist with cleaning at home.

name: Floor standing fan
description: Senior requires a floor standing fan for her home. Senior is staying alone and is on financial assistance.

name: Induction Cooker and TV

He worked as a cook many years ago, and would like to cook his own meals again. His donated TV screen has broken down as well.

name: Vacuum Cleaner

description: Client is a single mother of 5 children. Her husband passed away due to an accident. And she is the sole breadwinner of the family. Not only does she have to care for her 5 children, she also has to take care of her mother who is advanced in age and has multiple health issues. Client requested for a washing machine as her washing machine has broken down

name: Airfryer
description: Client and husband are unemployed. Husband is medically unfit for work and client has to be the main caregiver for her husband. They have 2 school-going children, age 11 and 9. Client requested for an airfryer so to avoid using oil when cooking as husband is ill and has multiple chronic illnesses.

name: HALAL Refrigerator
description:
Client has a large family with 6 dependents. Her husband left his employment in Nov 2021, and she is the main breadwinner with an adhoc packing job. Client was unable to work due to having to follow up with the hospital after one of her children's labour over the weekend. She subsequently lost her NRIC, which is required for the registration of her adhoc job, and thus currently unemployed.
Currently, her fridge has broken down, which disallows her from storing fresh foods and rations which are donated to her.

name: Refrigerator / Fridge
description: Client's BTO is unfurnished. She hopes to receive a fridge to place her food items.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Woodlands
contact.name: Joanne Lim

name: Ceiling Fan
description: Client is undergoing divorce and the main caregiver for her daughter, 7, who displays trauma symptoms due to past family violence. The family do not have a ceiling fan at home, but have been moving a standing fan in and out of the rooms due to the heat and insufficient air circulation. Interested donors can contact Chen Chen at lichenchen@carecorner.org.sg.

name: Ceiling Fan with light
description: Client (F/21) is a young mom to two children (F/2) and (M/8 months). Client is currently pregnant with her third child due in August. Both parents are unemployed and relying on SSO financial assistance for expenses.

name: CCTV
description: Client is in her mid 50s and staying home alone. She faces disturbances from her neighbour opposite her house and is in need of a CCTV to be placed outside her door (after getting approval from Town Council) for safety but is unable to afford one.

contact.name: Annabel Dass

name: Laptop (with webcam)
description: Client (F/64) is a widowed and staying with 3 grandchildren. The family depends solely on client’s limited income. The second granddaughter just entered to ITE and request a laptop for her studying.  Your kind blessing for a laptop is deeply appreciated as it will certainly help the child with their study and financial situation. Thank you. (Xin mo)

He hopes to have a bicycle that is in good condition and would allow him to shift gears so he can navigate various terrains more easily. The donation of the bicycle would assist him in making more deliveries. Interested donors please contact Shermaine at 6365 8751.

description: This is a  nuclear family of 7 household members with 5 children and 2 adults. The mother is presently pregnant with her 6th child and appealing for donated items. The family is on Comcare assistance. The father is unemployed due to chronic diseases and is on follow up for his health. The family is staying in 1 room rental flat.

name: Request for safety shoe
description:
Client (F37) single mother of 4 children, from low-income family. Hasn't been working due to caregiver issues. She will be starting a new job this Friday and will need a safety shoe asap. Size EUR 39/40

Contact: Ms Taferine @ taferinechua@amkfsc.org.sg or 88825747

name: Standalone Kitchen Sink
description: Client's new BTO flat is unfurnished, there is no sink to wash dishes. Client is unemployed and hopes to receive a simple standing Kitchen Sink.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Woodlands
contact.name: Joanne Lim

name: Adult Diapers Size L, Underpads
description:
Ct is a 66yo man who was rough sleeping for 5 years. He is currently undergoing divorce and pending rental flat approval. Ct has multiple chronic diseases and has undergone a surgery in 2021. Subsequently, he was hospitalized for 5 months and his mobility has been affected. Ct currently lives alone in a rented room. As he has not been able to work for 8 months, Ct's savings are dwindling and he requires support to meet needs - adult diapers and underpads. These are helpful for him when he has urgent needs but is unable to travel to the toilet in time. 

Adult diapers of any brand is appreciated. Size L. Underpads are appreciated as well. Thanks!

name: Blood pressure monitor
description: Client has kidney failure and is undergoing dialysis x3 times a week. She has a child born out of wedlock, who also have kidney issues. Client is required to have a blood pressure monitor but is unable to afford one.

name: Adult Diapers
description: Client is a single parent who is taking care of elderly sick mother needing adult diapers. Client is working multiple jobs to juggle between housing loans, and mother's medical bills. Donations of adult diapers will help to alleviate client's financial burdens.

PROskin Pants Normal Adult Diaper Size L (Hip Size: 100cm - 135cm) 10s

Four packs. Kindly contact 8628 1578. Thanks.

He has chronic illnesses such as diabetes, hypertension and kidney failure which requires him to undergo dialysis thrice a week. He hopes to have a blood glucose monitor that can assist him to check his blood glucose regularly. Any assistance would be great, thank you!
